visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) on the main background to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.light_leaks: Use radial gradients to simulate light hitting a gemstone facet in the background of hero sections.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders with 5-10% opacity. No heavy shadows.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a Single Page Application (SPA) feel using React Router. The vibe must be 'Dark Luxury' but 'Industrial'. Think: A jewelry store in a converted warehouse.
instructions_to_main_agent.gallery_implementation: Create a 'SplitView' component. Left side is a sticky sidebar with categories (Sapphire, Tourmaline, etc.). Right side is a masonry or strict grid of images. Clicking a category filters the right side with a smooth fade transition.
instructions_to_main_agent.booking_flow: The booking form is the primary conversion point. Make it feel premium. Use 'Step-by-step' or a very clean, single-column layout. Do not clutter it. The 'Thank You' state must be prominent.
instructions_to_main_agent.shop_integration: Use a clean grid for the shop. Product cards should focus entirely on the image. Price and Title should be minimal below the image. Add a 'Quick View' or 'Add to Cart' button that appears on hover.
instructions_to_main_agent.auth: Keep auth simple. Modal-based or a dedicated clean page. Do not distract from the gems.
universal_rules: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
Do not use default blue links. Style all links to match the brand palette.
